Table of Contents

Class DependencyContainer

Namespace
osu.Framework.Allocation
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

Hierarchically caches dependencies and can inject those automatically into types registered for dependency injection.

public class DependencyContainer : IReadOnlyDependencyContainer

DependencyContainer(IReadOnlyDependencyContainer)

Create a new DependencyContainer instance.

public DependencyContainer(IReadOnlyDependencyContainer parent = null)

Parameters

parent IReadOnlyDependencyContainer

An optional parent container which we should use as a fallback for cache lookups.

Methods

Cache(object)

Caches an instance of a type as its most derived type. This instance will be returned each time you Get(Type).

public void Cache(object instance)

Parameters

instance object

The instance to cache.

Cache(object, CacheInfo)

Caches an instance of a type as its most derived type. This instance will be returned each time you Get(Type).

public void Cache(object instance, CacheInfo info)

Parameters

instance object

The instance to cache.

info CacheInfo

Extra information to identify instance in the cache.

CacheAs<T>(Type, T)

Caches an instance of a type as a type of type. This instance will be returned each time you Get(Type).

public void CacheAs<T>(Type type, T instance) where T : class

Parameters

type Type

The type to cache instance as.

instance T

The instance to cache. Must be or derive from type.

Retrieves a cached dependency of type if it exists and null otherwise.

The dependency type to query for.

Returns

object

The requested dependency, or null if not found.

Inject<T>(T)

Injects dependencies into the given instance.

public void Inject<T>(T instance) where T : class, IDependencyInjectionCandidate

Parameters

instance T

The instance to inject dependencies into.

Type Parameters

T
